__TOC__

* Face to face meet up on Thursday 5th of November with <nowiki>[[http://www.linux.ie/|ILUG]]</nowiki> in the <nowiki>[[http://www.thelongstone.com|Longstone]]</nowiki>. 

* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2009-11-10|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Tuesday 10th November 2009.

 Congratulations to <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/czajkowski|Laura Czajkowski]]</nowiki> on her appointment.

* Initiated the <nowiki>[[http://github.com/theirishpenguin/qtonrails-examples|Qt on Rails]]</nowiki> project - currently a research project to see the feasibility of building a Rails based development framework for Kubuntu/KDE/Qt development.
